description: David Walker from Norfolk, Va., was 19 years old when Japanese torpedoes sunk his battleship, the USS California, during the surprise attack on the Hawaii naval base in 1941.
title: 8 decades later, remains of a Virginia sailor killed in Pearl Harbor are identified

description: The provider says it has reset the passcodes of the current account holders whose data was compromised as it investigates the leak, the latest in a string of telecommunications company data breaches.
title: Millions of customers' data found on dark web in latest AT&T data breach

description: Sikhs in California will vote in a referendum to push for their own independent state in India
title: Sikhs in California vote on independence from India

description: Debate is hot about the impact of a higher minimum wage. Half a million Californians work in fast-food, where wages had stagnated for decades. Restaurant owners warn of higher prices and fewer hours.
title: California fast-food workers will get $20 minimum wage, starting Monday

description: We're nearing a year when a negative leap second could be needed to shave time — an unprecedented step that would have unpredictable effects, a new study says.
title: Climate change is delaying world clocks' need for a 'negative leap second'

description: Rachel Crandall-Crocker, the founder of International Transgender Day of Visibility, said organizing has taught her one invaluable lesson: "You do not have to be perfect to change the world."
title: Trans Day of Visibility began 15 years ago. The founder is still moved by its success

description: The Port of Baltimore, normally one of the country's busiest, is in limbo due to the collapse of the Francis Scott Key Bridge. For those who work on the water, business is far from usual.
title: From longshoremen to charter boats, Baltimore's port closure means lost work

description: The secrecy that shrouded Princess Kate's cancer diagnosis is something that any new cancer patient can understand. It's daunting to decide when to share, whom to tell and how much to say.
title: A cancer diagnosis is a shock. Here's advice on how to share the news

description: The 23-year-old was crushed by an Israeli army bulldozer as she protested the demolition of homes in Gaza in 2003. Her memory remains cherished among Palestinians, including the family she lived with.
title: 21 years after her death in Gaza, Palestinians remember U.S. activist Rachel Corrie

description: Since before the political newcomer was inaugurated, there has been speculation that Maryland Gov. Wes Moore wants to run for higher office. The bridge collapse could be his first major test.
title: Baltimore bridge collapse has put the spotlight on Maryland's young Black governor

description: Until his running mate Nicole Shanahan can prove herself an asset, Kennedy will seem to have missed an opportunity to capture the imagination of the nation — or at least a meaningful segment of it.
title: RFK Jr. may have missed a major opportunity with his VP pick

description: U.S. government-funded Radio Free Asia is closing its Hong Kong operation after the city enacted a tough new national security law known locally as Article 23.
title: Radio Free Asia closes its Hong Kong operation over safety concerns for its staff
